name: SEO Watchdog - Keyword Priority Tracking
description: Advanced SEO monitoring with keyword prioritization and Google Sheets integration

nodes.name: Daily Schedule
nodes.notes: 🕘 DAILY SCHEDULER: Triggers keyword priority analysis at 9 AM

nodes.name: Priority Configuration
nodes.notes:
🎯 KEYWORD PRIORITY CONFIGURATION

📋 PRIORITY SYSTEM:
• High/Medium/Low thresholds
• Scoring weights configuration
• Performance benchmarks
• Batch processing limits

🔢 SCORING FACTORS:
• Impressions (30%): Search volume
• Position (25%): Current ranking
• CTR (20%): Click-through rate
• Clicks (15%): Actual traffic
• Trend (10%): Performance change

⚡ PERFORMANCE:
• Optimized batch sizes
• Timeout prevention
• Efficient processing

nodes.name: Get Tracked Keywords
nodes.notes:
📊 TRACKED KEYWORDS FROM GOOGLE SHEETS

📋 SHEET STRUCTURE (A:E):
• Column A: Keyword
• Column B: Priority (High/Medium/Low)
• Column C: Target Position
• Column D: Business Value (1-10)
• Column E: Notes

🎯 PURPOSE:
• Load user-defined keywords
• Apply manual priorities
• Set target positions
• Track business value

🔧 CONFIGURATION:
• Sheet ID: TRACKED_KEYWORDS_SHEET_ID env var
• Sheet Name: 'Keywords'
• Range: A:E (all keyword data)
• Header Row: Enabled

📈 FEATURES:
• Manual keyword entry
• Priority override capability
• Business value weighting
• Custom notes tracking

nodes.name: Process Keywords
nodes.notes:
🎯 KEYWORD PROCESSOR

📊 PROCESSING FEATURES:
• Validates keyword data
• Cleans and formats keywords
• Creates BigQuery filter
• Counts priority distribution

🛡️ DATA VALIDATION:
• Removes empty keywords
• Trims whitespace
• Converts to lowercase
• Escapes SQL quotes

📈 OUTPUT:
• Processed keyword list
• Priority distribution
• SQL filter string
• Processing status

🔧 ERROR HANDLING:
• Try-catch protection
• Graceful failure
• Error message logging
• Fallback to empty dataset

parameters.query:
-- 🎯 KEYWORD PRIORITY PERFORMANCE QUERY
-- Analyzes tracked keywords with priority scoring

WITH tracked_keyword_data AS (
  SELECT 
    date,
    query,
    page,
    device,
    SUM(clicks) as clicks,
    SUM(impressions) as impressions,
    SAFE_DIVIDE(SUM(clicks), SUM(impressions)) * 100 as ctr,
    AVG(position) as position,
    -- 🎯 Calculate weekly data for trends
    DATE_TRUNC(date, WEEK) as week
  FROM `{{ $env.GCP_PROJECT_ID }}.searchconsole.searchdata_site_impression`
  WHERE 
    date >= '{{ $("Process Keywords").first().json.date_range.start_date || $json.date_range.start_date }}'
    AND date <= '{{ $("Process Keywords").first().json.date_range.end_date || $json.date_range.end_date }}'
    {{ $("Process Keywords").first().json.keywords_query_filter || '' }}
    AND impressions >= 5  -- Minimum impressions for relevance
  GROUP BY date, query, page, device, week
),

keyword_performance AS (
  SELECT 
    query,
    page,
    SUM(clicks) as total_clicks,
    SUM(impressions) as total_impressions,
    SAFE_DIVIDE(SUM(clicks), SUM(impressions)) * 100 as avg_ctr,
    AVG(position) as avg_position,
    COUNT(DISTINCT date) as days_with_data,
    
    -- 📊 PRIORITY SCORING COMPONENTS
    CASE 
      WHEN SUM(impressions) >= {{ $json.priority_config.priority_scoring.high_impressions_threshold }} THEN 'HIGH_VOLUME'
      WHEN SUM(impressions) >= {{ $json.priority_config.priority_scoring.medium_impressions_threshold }} THEN 'MEDIUM_VOLUME'
      ELSE 'LOW_VOLUME'
    END as volume_tier,
    
    CASE 
      WHEN AVG(position) <= {{ $json.priority_config.priority_scoring.high_position_threshold }} THEN 'TOP_3'
      WHEN AVG(position) <= {{ $json.priority_config.priority_scoring.medium_position_threshold }} THEN 'TOP_10'
      WHEN AVG(position) <= {{ $json.priority_config.priority_scoring.low_position_threshold }} THEN 'TOP_20'
      ELSE 'BELOW_20'
    END as position_tier,
    
    CASE 
      WHEN SAFE_DIVIDE(SUM(clicks), SUM(impressions)) * 100 >= {{ $json.priority_config.priority_scoring.good_ctr_threshold }} THEN 'GOOD_CTR'
      WHEN SAFE_DIVIDE(SUM(clicks), SUM(impressions)) * 100 <= {{ $json.priority_config.priority_scoring.low_ctr_threshold }} THEN 'LOW_CTR'
      ELSE 'AVERAGE_CTR'
    END as ctr_tier
  FROM tracked_keyword_data
  GROUP BY query, page
),

weekly_trends AS (
  SELECT 
    query,
    page,
    -- Calculate week-over-week change
    LAG(SUM(clicks), 1) OVER (PARTITION BY query, page ORDER BY week) as prev_week_clicks,
    SUM(clicks) as current_week_clicks,
    SAFE_DIVIDE(
      SUM(clicks) - LAG(SUM(clicks), 1) OVER (PARTITION BY query, page ORDER BY week),
      LAG(SUM(clicks), 1) OVER (PARTITION BY query, page ORDER BY week)
    ) * 100 as clicks_change_percent
  FROM tracked_keyword_data
  WHERE week >= DATE_TRUNC(DATE_SUB(CURRENT_DATE(), INTERVAL 14 DAY), WEEK)
  GROUP BY query, page, week
),

latest_trends AS (
  SELECT 
    query,
    page,
    clicks_change_percent
  FROM weekly_trends
  WHERE current_week_clicks IS NOT NULL
  AND week = DATE_TRUNC(DATE_SUB(CURRENT_DATE(), INTERVAL 7 DAY), WEEK)
),

-- 🎯 PRIORITY SCORE CALCULATION
keyword_priority_scores AS (
  SELECT 
    kp.*,
    COALESCE(lt.clicks_change_percent, 0) as trend_percent,
    
    -- 📊 CALCULATE PRIORITY SCORE (0-100)
    ROUND(
      -- Impressions component (30%)
      (CASE 
        WHEN kp.volume_tier = 'HIGH_VOLUME' THEN 30
        WHEN kp.volume_tier = 'MEDIUM_VOLUME' THEN 20
        ELSE 10
      END) +
      
      -- Position component (25%) - lower position = higher score
      (CASE 
        WHEN kp.position_tier = 'TOP_3' THEN 25
        WHEN kp.position_tier = 'TOP_10' THEN 20
        WHEN kp.position_tier = 'TOP_20' THEN 15
        ELSE 5
      END) +
      
      -- CTR component (20%)
      (CASE 
        WHEN kp.ctr_tier = 'GOOD_CTR' THEN 20
        WHEN kp.ctr_tier = 'AVERAGE_CTR' THEN 15
        ELSE 5  -- LOW_CTR gets low score but is optimization opportunity
      END) +
      
      -- Clicks component (15%)
      (CASE 
        WHEN kp.total_clicks >= 100 THEN 15
        WHEN kp.total_clicks >= 20 THEN 10
        WHEN kp.total_clicks >= 5 THEN 5
        ELSE 2
      END) +
      
      -- Trend component (10%)
      (CASE 
        WHEN COALESCE(lt.clicks_change_percent, 0) > 20 THEN 10
        WHEN COALESCE(lt.clicks_change_percent, 0) > 0 THEN 7
        WHEN COALESCE(lt.clicks_change_percent, 0) > -20 THEN 5
        ELSE 2
      END)
    ) as priority_score,
    
    -- 🎯 OPTIMIZATION OPPORTUNITY CLASSIFICATION
    CASE 
      WHEN kp.avg_position BETWEEN 4 AND 10 AND kp.total_impressions > 1000 THEN 'POSITION_OPPORTUNITY'
      WHEN kp.avg_ctr < {{ $json.priority_config.priority_scoring.low_ctr_threshold }} AND kp.total_impressions > 500 THEN 'CTR_OPPORTUNITY'
      WHEN kp.avg_position BETWEEN 11 AND 20 AND kp.total_impressions > 200 THEN 'VISIBILITY_OPPORTUNITY'
      WHEN COALESCE(lt.clicks_change_percent, 0) < -30 THEN 'DECLINING_KEYWORD'
      WHEN kp.total_impressions > {{ $json.priority_config.priority_scoring.high_impressions_threshold }} THEN 'HIGH_VALUE_MONITOR'
      ELSE 'STANDARD_TRACKING'
    END as opportunity_type
    
  FROM keyword_performance kp
  LEFT JOIN latest_trends lt ON kp.query = lt.query AND kp.page = lt.page
)

-- 🎯 FINAL RESULTS: Prioritized keywords
SELECT 
  query,
  page,
  total_clicks,
  total_impressions,
  avg_ctr,
  avg_position,
  days_with_data,
  volume_tier,
  position_tier,
  ctr_tier,
  trend_percent,
  priority_score,
  opportunity_type,
  
  -- 🏆 FINAL PRIORITY CLASSIFICATION
  CASE 
    WHEN priority_score >= 80 THEN 'CRITICAL'
    WHEN priority_score >= 60 THEN 'HIGH'
    WHEN priority_score >= 40 THEN 'MEDIUM'
    ELSE 'LOW'
  END as final_priority
  
FROM keyword_priority_scores
ORDER BY priority_score DESC, total_impressions DESC
LIMIT {{ $json.priority_config.keywords_batch_size }}

nodes.name: Keyword Priority Analysis
nodes.notes:
🎯 KEYWORD PRIORITY ANALYSIS

📊 PRIORITY SCORING (0-100):
• Impressions (30%): Search volume impact
• Position (25%): Current ranking strength
• CTR (20%): Click-through performance
• Clicks (15%): Actual traffic value
• Trend (10%): Performance momentum

🏆 PRIORITY LEVELS:
• CRITICAL (80-100): Immediate attention
• HIGH (60-79): High impact opportunities
• MEDIUM (40-59): Standard monitoring
• LOW (0-39): Low priority tracking

🎯 OPPORTUNITY TYPES:
• POSITION_OPPORTUNITY: Rankings 4-10
• CTR_OPPORTUNITY: Low CTR, high impressions
• VISIBILITY_OPPORTUNITY: Rankings 11-20
• DECLINING_KEYWORD: 30%+ traffic drop
• HIGH_VALUE_MONITOR: High volume tracking
• STANDARD_TRACKING: Regular monitoring

📈 FEATURES:
• Weekly trend analysis
• Volume tier classification
• Performance benchmarking
• Optimization opportunity identification

parameters.query:
-- 📊 PERFORMANCE DATA WITH KEYWORD CONTEXT
-- Enhanced performance query considering tracked keywords

WITH recent_data AS (
  SELECT 
    date,
    page,
    query,
    clicks,
    impressions,
    SAFE_DIVIDE(clicks, impressions) * 100 as ctr,
    position,
    device,
    -- 🎯 Mark if this is a tracked keyword
    CASE 
      WHEN {{ $("Process Keywords").first().json.processing_status.has_tracked_keywords || false }} = true 
           {{ $("Process Keywords").first().json.keywords_query_filter || '' }}
      THEN true
      ELSE false
    END as is_tracked_keyword
  FROM `{{ $env.GCP_PROJECT_ID }}.searchconsole.searchdata_site_impression`
  WHERE 
    date >= '{{ $json.date_range.start_date }}'
    AND date <= '{{ $json.date_range.end_date }}'
    AND impressions >= {{ $json.priority_config.priority_scoring.min_clicks_threshold }}
),

page_performance AS (
  SELECT 
    page,
    SUM(clicks) as total_clicks,
    SUM(impressions) as total_impressions,
    SAFE_DIVIDE(SUM(clicks), SUM(impressions)) * 100 as avg_ctr,
    AVG(position) as avg_position,
    COUNT(DISTINCT query) as keyword_count,
    COUNT(DISTINCT CASE WHEN is_tracked_keyword THEN query END) as tracked_keyword_count,
    DATE_DIFF(CURRENT_DATE(), MAX(date), DAY) as days_since_last_data
  FROM recent_data
  GROUP BY page
),

traffic_trends AS (
  SELECT 
    page,
    DATE_TRUNC(date, WEEK) as week,
    SUM(clicks) as weekly_clicks,
    SUM(impressions) as weekly_impressions
  FROM recent_data
  GROUP BY page, week
),

weekly_comparison AS (
  SELECT 
    page,
    LAG(weekly_clicks, 1) OVER (PARTITION BY page ORDER BY week) as prev_week_clicks,
    weekly_clicks as current_week_clicks,
    SAFE_DIVIDE(weekly_clicks - LAG(weekly_clicks, 1) OVER (PARTITION BY page ORDER BY week), LAG(weekly_clicks, 1) OVER (PARTITION BY page ORDER BY week)) * 100 as click_change_percent
  FROM traffic_trends
  WHERE week = DATE_TRUNC(DATE_SUB(CURRENT_DATE(), INTERVAL 7 DAY), WEEK)
)

SELECT 
  pp.page,
  pp.total_clicks,
  pp.total_impressions,
  pp.avg_ctr,
  pp.avg_position,
  pp.keyword_count,
  pp.tracked_keyword_count,
  pp.days_since_last_data,
  COALESCE(wc.click_change_percent, 0) as click_change_percent,
  
  -- 🎯 Enhanced alert classification considering tracked keywords
  CASE 
    WHEN COALESCE(wc.click_change_percent, 0) < -20 AND pp.tracked_keyword_count > 0 THEN 'tracked_keyword_drop'
    WHEN COALESCE(wc.click_change_percent, 0) < -20 THEN 'traffic_drop'
    WHEN COALESCE(wc.click_change_percent, 0) > 20 AND pp.tracked_keyword_count > 0 THEN 'tracked_keyword_surge'
    WHEN COALESCE(wc.click_change_percent, 0) > 20 THEN 'traffic_surge'
    WHEN pp.avg_ctr < {{ $json.priority_config.priority_scoring.low_ctr_threshold }} AND pp.total_impressions > 1000 AND pp.tracked_keyword_count > 0 THEN 'tracked_low_ctr'
    WHEN pp.avg_ctr < {{ $json.priority_config.priority_scoring.low_ctr_threshold }} AND pp.total_impressions > 1000 THEN 'low_ctr'
    WHEN pp.avg_position > {{ $json.priority_config.priority_scoring.medium_position_threshold }} AND pp.total_impressions > 500 AND pp.tracked_keyword_count > 0 THEN 'tracked_low_position'
    WHEN pp.avg_position > {{ $json.priority_config.priority_scoring.medium_position_threshold }} AND pp.total_impressions > 500 THEN 'low_position'
    WHEN pp.days_since_last_data > 7 THEN 'potential_deindex'
    WHEN pp.tracked_keyword_count > 0 THEN 'tracked_normal'
    ELSE 'normal'
  END as alert_type,
  
  -- 🎯 Page priority based on tracked keyword presence
  CASE 
    WHEN pp.tracked_keyword_count > 0 AND pp.total_impressions > {{ $json.priority_config.priority_scoring.high_impressions_threshold }} THEN 'HIGH'
    WHEN pp.tracked_keyword_count > 0 AND pp.total_impressions > {{ $json.priority_config.priority_scoring.medium_impressions_threshold }} THEN 'MEDIUM'
    WHEN pp.tracked_keyword_count > 0 THEN 'LOW'
    ELSE 'UNTRACKED'
  END as page_priority
  
FROM page_performance pp
LEFT JOIN weekly_comparison wc ON pp.page = wc.page
ORDER BY 
  CASE WHEN pp.tracked_keyword_count > 0 THEN 0 ELSE 1 END,  -- Tracked keywords first
  pp.total_clicks DESC
LIMIT {{ $json.priority_config.performance_batch_size }}

nodes.name: Enhanced Performance Data
nodes.notes:
📊 ENHANCED PERFORMANCE DATA

🎯 KEYWORD-AWARE ANALYSIS:
• Identifies tracked keyword pages
• Prioritizes tracked keyword performance
• Enhanced alert classification
• Page priority scoring

🚨 ENHANCED ALERTS:
• tracked_keyword_drop: Tracked keywords losing traffic
• tracked_keyword_surge: Tracked keywords gaining traffic
• tracked_low_ctr: Tracked keywords with low CTR
• tracked_low_position: Tracked keywords ranking poorly
• tracked_normal: Tracked keywords performing normally

📈 PAGE PRIORITIES:
• HIGH: Tracked keywords + high impressions
• MEDIUM: Tracked keywords + medium impressions
• LOW: Tracked keywords + low impressions
• UNTRACKED: No tracked keywords

🔧 FEATURES:
• Tracked keyword counting
• Priority-based sorting
• Enhanced classification
• Performance context

nodes.name: Save Priority Results
nodes.notes:
💾 SAVE PRIORITY RESULTS

📊 SHEET STRUCTURE:
• Date: Analysis date
• Keyword: Search query
• Page: Landing page URL
• Clicks/Impressions: Performance metrics
• CTR/Position: Ranking data
• Priority Score: Calculated score (0-100)
• Priority: CRITICAL/HIGH/MEDIUM/LOW
• Opportunity: Optimization type
• Trend %: Performance change
• Tracked: Is manually tracked
• Manual Priority: User-defined priority

🎯 PURPOSE:
• Historical tracking
• Priority trend analysis
• Performance monitoring
• Strategic planning

📈 BENEFITS:
• Data persistence
• Trend analysis
• Reporting capabilities
• Strategic insights
